entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 24 March 2023
